overview: Himeli, the director of a cookery show, is unable to tolerate Subramaniam, her new Tamil, vegetarian flatmate. Coincidentally, when the TRP ratings of her show begin to fall, Subramaniam comes to Himeli's rescue. Despite the differences in their personalities, the two get attracted to each other. Enjoy this romantic comedy which presents the contrast of Bengali and South Indian culture and food habits.
title: Filter Coffee Liquor Chaa
